name: Gold Silver Pearl Ring
description:
Handmade ring!! I took the moon for your hands 

This seems to be the moon in your hands! This is a handmade ring with a beautiful pearl with metal & fabric threads around. The perfect combination of gold & silver touch. 

This was the moon that light up my soul and inspires me to create my second collection Lovely Pieces.

The ring is adjustable!

From "Lovely Pieces" collection… those that make you fall in love, those that found a new way to live, that want to forget that were made to hold a wood door or to organize all those papers that drive you crazy! 

A lovely way to wear the moon in your hands!

If you have any question please email me at bydelirium@hotmail.es

To see more of our "Delirium World" visit us in www.bydelirium.com and become a fan in our www.facebook/bydelirium.com

Please read our shipping policy carefully to make the purchase as satisfactory as possible.

Shipment with tracking number

name: Big Wire Silver Heart Ring
description:
Eternal love Ring Silver hand & made heart

From eternal love Collection! Those ones that make you fall in love at first time. 

This heart is handmade of metal silver threats & 2 much love . You can see variations of this one in our web www.bydelirium.com 

The ring is adjustable! 
The piece from the picture is a sample. The one you will reacived could be a little different from it because everything is handmade
If you want more pieces I can make them and put some variations on it, I can make it smaller if you prefer it.

A lovely way to take your heart in your hands!

name: Long Skull Earrings
description:
I´m sure you have seen this beautiful skulls everywhere, I found them like a year ago and I fell in love with them. For me these are angels that live in the sky taking care of us! That’s why I called them SKULL ANGELS. You can also see other beautiful accessories I made with them! 

Choose your favorite color!
1. Dark Fuchsia 2. Pink 3. Turquoise 4. Emerald Green 5. Black 

Earrings length approx. : 6,5 cm (length of the picture) 
If you want it shorter I can do it just tell me! 3.5 cms or 2.8 cm
